content: {"name": "Bridgeport Christian Friendship Council", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Bridgeport resident \nIts located below Saint Anthony's Church", "email": "", "url": "https://www.facebook.com/BridgeportChristianFriendshipCouncil", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "630 Main Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Bridgeport", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43912", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.0723743, "longitude": -80.7501521}, "phones": [{"number": "(740) 635-9063", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}]}
